metadata.title: CVE-2017-12482 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The ledger::parse_date_mask_routine function in times.cc in Ledger 3.1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: ledger package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2+dfsg1-1').
